attributes.action: use his influence and that of the Chancellor of the Exchequer to consider Dylan Thomas as a featur on any future redesigned Bank of England note
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the new £20 note soon to be in circulation, the £10 is likely to be next to be redesigned. Welsh culture, language, poetry, and national identity would be reflected in a unique and meaningful way if Dylan Thomas was featured on the £10.
